SEARCH
Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Class BlendInfo

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.BlendInfo
public final class BlendInfo extends Object
BlendInfo is an immutable object holding info for setting-up GPU blend states.
